trans-unit.source: Provides ambient property values to top-level controls.
An ambient property is a property on a control that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
If the control does not have a parent and the property is not set, the control tries to find the value of the ambient property through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A> property.

If the control is not sited, the site does not support ambient properties, or the property is not set on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> object, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> uses its own default values.
Some objects derived from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class might set the property even if you do not.
For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class always sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> properties.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the ambient background color of an object.
If there is no ambient background color, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the background color of an object.
Gets or sets the ambient cursor of an object.
If there is no ambient cursor, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> property is `null`.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"></xref> that represents the cursor of an object.
Gets or sets the ambient font of an object.
If there is no ambient font, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property is `null`.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> that represents the font used when displaying text within an object.
Gets or sets the ambient foreground color of an object.
If there is no ambient foreground color, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the foreground color of an object.
